transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha mam, mam good evening mam. India mart call pannirukenga.
Customer: Sollunga sir, sollunga sir.
Executive: Ha mam, eppidi irukinga mam? India mart la irunthu Saran pesuren, account manager than.
Customer: Ha ha ha, vanakkam vanakkam sir, nalla irukingala sir?
Executive: Nalla iruken mam, nalla iruken.
Customer: Sollunga sir, nalla irukom sir, nalla irukom sir, sollunga sir.
Executive: Enna achu mam? Namma last naalaiki pesina pechula irunthu namma site la usage suthamaave illa mam apdintradhu maari sollirundhen.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ippo namma oru 15 days ku meleeye namma suthama use pannalaingale, enna achu mam?
Customer: Illa avarum veliyila poittaru, odissa poirukaru meeting kaaga.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: So naanum veliyila irukradhunaala onnum panna mudiyala, engalukkum meeting poirukaru.
Executive: Ippo oruthar innoru staff potrukken apdintradhu maari sonningale mam.
Customer: Adhaan avaru manovachithane paathaaru.
Executive: Aama aama, enna avaru avaru dhaan. Idhume avar follow pannikonga apdintradhu maari neenga dhaan sonninga, adhanaala dhaan avar.
Customer: Adhaan sir.
Executive: Avar number koduthirukinga appidina.
Customer: Aaa aa aa.
Executive: Adhaan adhanaala dhaan ungala disturb panna vendiya panra maari irukudhu, enna avar follow panna sonninga.
Customer: Naan ippo oru number share panren, neenga andha number la vandhu neenga avarai kuppittukonga, manovachith avar eduppaaru.
Executive: Okay mam, okay mam, neenga whatsapp la podunga.
Customer: Ippo aana avar avar family la iruppaaru, naalaiki reach aayiduvaanga tamilnattukku.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Leads eppidi mam irukku?
Customer: Illa sir naan check pannave illinga sir.
Customer: Paakave illa, naan paakren sir.
Executive: Enna ungallukku direct enquiry enna actually ippo edhunaala naan ippo ungallukku naan again thiruppi naan call pannirukken nu paathinganna, ippo namma site la neenga oru 15 days namma use pannadhadhunaala idhu oru concern maari raise aayirukudhu.
Executive: So appidi appidina actually ennodai site la naan client use panna vaikkala apdintradhu maari en site la oru issue maari raise aayirukudhu.
Customer: Seri seri.
Executive: Adhanaala dhaan naan ippo enakku ippodhaan mail vandhudhu, adhanaala dhaan naan ippo udane immediately call pannen.
Customer: Seri seri, seri sir.
Executive: Sollunga mam.
Customer: Naan ippo paakren, naan ippo login panni paakren, naan avaroda number share panren, naalaiki vandhuruvaaru avarai naalaikku aanainnila irunthu neenga follow pannitaaru.
Executive: Okay mam, enna naan ippo actually naan ippo ungalukku oru five minutes pesinaa mattum dhaan andha call ennalla close panna mudiyum mam, adhanaala dhaan naan call pannen ungallukku.
Customer: Seri seri seri seri sir seri sir. Enna ungallukku enquiries direct enquiries nallave irukudhingale mam.
Executive: Illa neriya per call panraanga dhaan.
Executive: Direct illa naan call solla varala mam, direct enquiries solren mam.
Customer: Aaa aa aa seri seri seri.
Executive: Adhaavadhu direct aa namma product paathuttu andha buyer vandhu nammallukku mail mooliyama enquiry varundhingala?
Customer: Aama aama aama varudhu.
Executive: So andha andha enquiry paathinga appidina nammallukku last october month paathinga appidina nammallukku basic service la irukkom namma, indha service la paathinga appidina nammallukku 40 enquiry vandhirukudhu.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: So idhu paathinga appidina highest irukradhiliye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Adhaavadhu andha basic service la irukra adhaan andha basic service la irukra client ku 40 enquiries direct aa vandhirukudhu apdintradhe paathinga appidina unmaiyileme ungallukku unga catalog vandhu andha alavukku nalla promote aagittu irundhuchu last month fullaave.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Ippo ippo paathinga appidina ippo indha namma november anja anju thedhi aayirukudhu, ippo vara paathinga appidina rende rendu enquiry dhaan vandhirukudhu.
Executive: So enna reason theriyingala? Namma 15 naal namma use pannadhadhunaala namma catalog irukundradhe buyers ku nyaabagam illama marandhuruchu.
Customer: Ooo ooo ooo.
Executive: Enna ippo namma GST location pudhukottai correct ingala?
Customer: Aama aama sir.
Executive: So ippo andha pudhukottai location la and then thiruppi madhurai ingittu sivagangai and then dindukkal indha maari area la namma pudhukottai la irunthu 250 kilometers surrounding la irukra area, idhu ellaathilume paathinga appidina namma company dhaan front la promote aagittu vandhukittu irundhuchu ippo.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: So idhu sadanaa namma usage kurainjadhunaala appidiye andha promotion aanadhu drop aagiduchu.
Customer: Seri seri sir seri seri.
Executive: Enna direct calls paathinga appidina nammallukku last month vandhu direct calls vandhu oru 15 calls receive aayirukudhu.
Executive: Adhukku munna september month la paathinga appidina 20 calls receive aayirukudhu, last anju anju call vandhu anjume pesiningala mam?
Customer: Pesunanga sir.
Executive: Enna sonnaanga mam? Enna sonnaanga mam?
Customer: Illa product idhu anuppa sonnaanga list matta enna enna products irukku list anuppa solli avangaloda number koduthu list anuppa sonnaanga.
Executive: Hmm and then vandhu indha november maasam ippo varaikkum paathinga appidina rendu call vandhirukudhu rendume pesitingala ungallukku?
Customer: Indha month naan meeting attend pannala sir attend panniruppaaru.
Executive: Okay okay rendume rendume pesirukinga.
Customer: Pesirukken adhaan naan attend pannama vittutten sir attend panniruppaaru.
Executive: Seri mam neenga enakku number mattum enakku konjam whatsapp pannunga mam.
Customer: Naan share panren. Ennoda number ungallukku irukku already.
Customer: Irukku irukku irukku.
Executive: Seri mam thank you mam thank you.
Customer: Okay fine.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART site usage is nil.

- Catalog promotion has dropped due to decreased usage.

- Wants to know about direct enquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive shared concern about decreased site usage.

- Customer will share the contact number of staff.

- Executive explained the importance of site usage.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share staff contact number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- usage, enquiries, catalog, promotion
